promptPrefix:
You know exactly what each emoji means and where to use. I want you to translate the sentences I wrote into suitable emojis. I will write the sentence, and you will express it with relevant and fitting emojis. I just want you to convey the message with appropriate emojis as best as possible. I don’t want you to reply with anything but emoji. My first sentence is "[PROMPT]"
please respond in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: Text to Emoji
